caption:
This photograph features a person working inside what appears to be a laboratory setting. The individual, a man wearing glasses and a T-shirt, is visible through a transparent protective safety barrier, focusing intently on his task. He is adjusting or examining equipment, which includes a water tap and a glass container placed on a metal tray, potentially part of an experiment or a procedure.

The setting includes typical laboratory elements such as the white, sterile-looking surfaces and some items in the background that suggest a controlled scientific environment. The use of a protective barrier indicates the need for either contamination prevention or protection from potentially hazardous materials. The image captures a moment of concentrated scientific work, bathed in natural light from a sunlight source outside the frame, which highlights the clarity and intensity of the laboratory work environment.
title: Lab technician at secondary treatment sewage plant
